title: I feel like this Kass skin was supposed to be a Victorious Skin for an earlier season
body:
but then they scrapped it. Seriously, compare this to the other Victorious Skins. He was also super OP for months back in Season 3 so....?

http://i.imgur.com/7zB4RWx.jpg

Sauce: http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/09/929-pbe-update.html#more

Edit: Maybe not so much the colors of the particles, but definitely the model. The particles themselves could have been used for a Victorious Skin too if they were just a dark blue/gold color scheme.
